answerText: Look Back in Anger[10] In addition to writing about Archie Rice in The Entertainer, this author wrote Look Back in Anger.
heading: Penn-ance |2012 | 4 | 7 | Literature | British | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: A brief fight in this play ends with an iron burning Alison's arm, after which Helena Charles tries to break up Alison's marriage. For 10 points each: [10] Name this play in which Colonel Redfern tries to take Alison away from her husband, Jimmy Porter.
